I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

A1: A
A0: A

plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A

divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)
gb: mon n * bool -> bool
gm: mon n * bool -> mon n

Goal:
forall a b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> forall (nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b) (nZppab : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (ppc a b)), list (Term A n) -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b) (b:=ppc a b) nZppab) (divTerm (ppc a b) (b:=b) nZb))

Premises:
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool

eqTerm : forall A : Set, (A -> A -> Prop) -> forall n : nat, Term A n -> Term A n -> Prop
CoefStructure : forall (A : Set) (A0 : A), A -> forall eqA : A -> A -> Prop, (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A) -> Prop
multTerm : forall A : Set, (A -> A -> A) -> forall n : nat, Term A n -> Term A n -> Term A n
zero_mon : forall d : nat, mon d
Inductive mon : nat -> Set := n_0 : mon 0 | c_n : forall d : nat, nat -> mon d -> mon (S d) Arguments mon _%nat_scope Arguments c_n (_ _)%nat_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
ppc = fun H : Term A n => let (_, c2) := H in fun H' : Term A n => let (_, c3) := H' in (A1, ppcm_mon n c2 c3) : Term A n -> Term A n -> Term A n
zeroP : forall A : Set, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> forall n : nat, Term A n -> Prop
OrderStructure : forall A : Set, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> (A -> A -> A) -> Prop
mult_mon : forall d : nat, mon d -> mon d -> mon d
left : ?A -> {?A} + {?B} where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n ->...-> mon n |- Prop]
right : ?B -> {?A} + {?B} where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n ->...-> mon n |- Prop]
pair : ?A -> ?B -> ?A * ?B where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n ->...-> mon n |- Type]

divTerm_ppc : forall (a b c : Term A n) (nZa : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a) (nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b) (nZppab : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (ppc a b)), eqTerm eqA (n:=n) c (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm c (b:=a) nZa) a) -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) c (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm c (b:=b) nZb) b) -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) c (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm c (b:=ppc a b) nZppab) (ppc a b))
multTerm_zeroP_div : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b) -> zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a \/ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b
Inductive divP : Term A n -> Term A n -> Prop := divTerm_def : forall a b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> forall nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b, eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=b) nZb) b) -> divP a b
divP_ind : forall P : Term A n -> Term A n -> Prop, (forall a b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> forall nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b, eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=b) nZb) b) -> P a b) -> forall t t0 : Term A n, divP t t0 -> P t t0
divP_sind : forall P : Term A n -> Term A n -> SProp, (forall a b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> forall nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b, eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=b) nZb) b) -> P a b) -> forall t t0 : Term A n, divP t t0 -> P t t0
A_sep : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall a b : A, eqA (multA a b) A0 -> eqA a A0 \/ eqA b A0
ppc_nZ : forall a b : Term A n, Term A n -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (ppc a b)
divTerm_ppcr : forall a b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> forall nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b, eqTerm eqA (n:=n) (ppc a b) (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm (ppc a b) (b:=b) nZb) b)
divTerm_dec : forall a b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> forall nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b, {eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=b) nZb) b)} + {~ eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=b) nZb) b)}
divTerm_def : forall a b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> forall nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b, eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=b) nZb) b) -> divP a b
ppc_multTerm_divP : forall a b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> divP (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b) (ppc a b)
divTerm_on_eqT : forall a b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> forall nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b, eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=b) nZb) b)
divTerm_compo : forall (a b c : Term A n) (nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b) (nZc : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) c), divP a b -> divP b c -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=c) nZc) (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=b) nZb) (divTerm b (b:=c) nZc))
divTerm_ppcl : forall (a b : Term A n) (nZa : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a), ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) (ppc a b) (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm (ppc a b) (b:=a) nZa) a)
divTerm_eqT : forall a b c : Term A n, eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> forall nZc : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) c, eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=c) nZc) c) -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) b (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm b (b:=c) nZc) c)
ppc_is_ppcm : forall a b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> ppcm a b (ppc a b)
divP_ppcl : forall a b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> divP (ppc a b) a
divTerm_on_plusM_minusM : forall a b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> forall nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b, T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) a = mult_mon n (div_mon n (T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) a) (T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) b)) (T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) b) -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=b) nZb) b)
divP_ppcr : forall a b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> divP (ppc a b) b
divP_inv3 : forall (a b : Term A n) (nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b), divP a b -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=b) nZb) b)
divTerm_on_eqT_eqT : forall a b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> forall nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b, eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=b) nZb) (T1 A1 n)
divP_on_eqT_eqT : forall a b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> forall nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b, eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b -> eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=b) nZb) (T1 A1 n)
T1_multTerm_l : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (T1 A1 n) -> eqTerm eqA (n:=n) b (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b)
divTerm_multTerml : forall a b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> divP (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b) a
divTerm_multTermr : forall a b : Term A n, ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b -> divP (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b) b

```coq
intros a b H H0 H1 l.
assert (nZa : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a) by auto.
assert (nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b) by auto.
assert (nZppab : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (ppc a b)) by (apply ppc_nZ; auto).
assert (H2 : divP a (ppc a b)) by (apply divP_ppcl; auto).
assert (H3 : divP b (ppc a b)) by (apply divP_ppcr; auto).
assert (H4 : eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=ppc a b) nZppab) (ppc a b))) by (apply divP_inv3; auto).
assert (H5 : eqTerm eqA (n:=n) b (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm b (b:=ppc a b) nZppab) (ppc a b))) by (apply divP_inv3; auto).
assert (H6 : eqTerm eqA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b) (multTerm multA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=ppc a b) nZppab) (ppc a b)) (divTerm b (b:=ppc a b) nZppab))) by (apply divTerm_compo; auto).
assert (H7 : eqTerm eqA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b) (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b) (b:=ppc a b) nZppab) (ppc a b))) by (apply divTerm_def; auto).
apply H7.
Qed.```

original: intros a b H H0 H1 l. assert (nZa : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a) by auto. assert (nZb : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b) by auto. assert (nZppab : ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (ppc a b)) by (apply ppc_nZ; auto). assert (H2 : divP a (ppc a b)) by (apply divP_ppcl; auto). assert (H3 : divP b (ppc a b)) by (apply divP_ppcr; auto). assert (H4 : eqTerm eqA (n:=n) a (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=ppc a b) nZppab) (ppc a b))) by (apply divP_inv3; auto). assert (H5 : eqTerm eqA (n:=n) b (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm b (b:=ppc a b) nZppab) (ppc a b))) by (apply divP_inv3; auto). assert (H6 : eqTerm eqA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b) (multTerm multA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm a (b:=ppc a b) nZppab) (ppc a b)) (divTerm b (b:=ppc a b) nZppab))) by (apply divTerm_compo; auto). assert (H7 : eqTerm eqA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b) (multTerm multA (n:=n) (divTerm (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b) (b:=ppc a b) nZppab) (ppc a b))) by (apply divTerm_def; auto). apply H7.
